posts.name: Billfred Leverette (he/him/not Bill)
posts.cooked: I think you’re going to find it’s largely dictated by the modules you’re running.  Most of the modules running 4" diameter wheels run 1.5" wide wheels (in particular, SDS MK4 family and WCP SwerveX), while modules with 3" wheels will generally be 1" width (REV MAXSwerve, WCP SwerveXS, the original Thrifty Swerve).

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: says you should come to SCRIW in October
